2023 年 11 月 2 日星期四 21:58:22 +0000每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks TED - TED.com TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到 TED 演讲，这些演讲激发、激发和激发了一些世界领先的思想家和实干家的想象力，他们在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地的合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 TED 会议上值得传播的想法泰德TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到 TED 演讲，这些演讲激发、激发和激发了一些世界领先的思想家和实干家的想象力，他们在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地的合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 zh知识共享：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/泰德contact@ted.com https://pl.tedcdn.com/rss_feed_images/ted_talks_main_podcast/video.png每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks 144 144 科学技术娱乐设计 TED、TEDTalks、TED 演讲、灵感、创造力、技术演示、教育不非成人的
回收全球电池的强大可能性|艾玛·尼伦海姆艾玛·尼伦海姆The world has plenty of clean energy. The problem is storing that energy and getting it where we need it, when we need it, says battery recycling pioneer Emma Nehrenheim. While batteries are fundamental to powering a sustainable future, their production is surprisingly harsh on the environment. She lays out the science behind a breakthrough in recycling a battery's core elements, offering a manufacturing solution that could vastly reduce the industry's environmental impact and demand for new materials from mining.回收全球电池的强大可能性|艾玛·尼伦海姆The world has plenty of clean energy. The problem is storing that energy and getting it where we need it, when we need it, says battery recycling pioneer Emma Nehrenheim. While batteries are fundamental to powering a sustainable future, their production is surprisingly harsh on the environment. She lays out the science behind a breakthrough in recycling a battery's core elements, offering a manufacturing solution that could vastly reduce the industry's environmental impact and demand for new materials from mining. https://www.ted.com/talks/emma_nehrenheim_the_powerful_possibilities_of_recycling_the_world_s_batteries?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:118063 118063 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 14:54:53 +0000高等教育不00:09:47泰德
非传统思维的力量 |大卫·麦克威廉姆斯大卫·麦克威廉姆斯From World War I to the 2008 economic collapse and beyond, history shows that economists don't always see the future as clearly as they think they do, says economist David McWilliams. Using the words of W.B. Yeats, McWilliams makes the case for embracing unconventional thinkers – poets, artists and musicians – and offers a creative path towards a world filled with less confirmation bias and more understanding.非传统思维的力量 |大卫·麦克威廉姆斯From World War I to the 2008 economic collapse and beyond, history shows that economists don't always see the future as clearly as they think they do, says economist David McWilliams. Using the words of W.B. Yeats, McWilliams makes the case for embracing unconventional thinkers – poets, artists and musicians – and offers a creative path towards a world filled with less confirmation bias and more understanding. https://www.ted.com/talks/david_mcwilliams_the_power_of_unconventional_thinking?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:118062 118062 Wed, 01 Nov 2023 14:58:28 +0000高等教育不00:18:06泰德
人工智能很危险，但原因并非你想象的那样 |萨莎·卢奇奥尼萨莎·卢奇奥尼AI won't kill us all — but that doesn't make it trustworthy. Instead of getting distracted by future existential risks, AI ethics researcher Sasha Luccioni thinks we need to focus on the technology's current negative impacts, like emitting carbon, infringing copyrights and spreading biased information. She offers practical solutions to regulate our AI-filled future — so it's inclusive and transparent.人工智能很危险，但原因并非你想象的那样 |萨莎·卢奇奥尼AI won't kill us all — but that doesn't make it trustworthy. Instead of getting distracted by future existential risks, AI ethics researcher Sasha Luccioni thinks we need to focus on the technology's current negative impacts, like emitting carbon, infringing copyrights and spreading biased information. She offers practical solutions to regulate our AI-filled future — so it's inclusive and transparent. https://www.ted.com/talks/sasha_luccioni_ai_is_dangerous_but_not_for_the_reasons_you_think?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:119420 119420 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 14:46:53 +0000高等教育不00:10:15泰德
如何控制人工智能？马克斯·泰格马克马克斯·泰格马克The current explosion of exciting commercial and open-source AI is likely to be followed, within a few years, by creepily superintelligent AI – which top researchers and experts fear could disempower or wipe out humanity. Scientist Max Tegmark describes an optimistic vision for how we can keep AI under control and ensure it's working for us, not the other way around.如何控制人工智能？马克斯·泰格马克The current explosion of exciting commercial and open-source AI is likely to be followed, within a few years, by creepily superintelligent AI – which top researchers and experts fear could disempower or wipe out humanity. Scientist Max Tegmark describes an optimistic vision for how we can keep AI under control and ensure it's working for us, not the other way around. https://www.ted.com/talks/max_tegmark_how_to_keep_ai_under_control?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:119528 119528 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 14:38:42 +0000高等教育不00:12:06泰德
如何以计算方式思考人工智能、宇宙和一切 |史蒂芬·沃尔弗拉姆史蒂芬·沃尔弗拉姆Drawing on his decades-long mission to formulate the world in computational terms, Stephen Wolfram delivers a profound vision of computation and its role in the future of AI. Amid a debut of mesmerizing visuals depicting the underlying structure of the universe, he provides a sweeping survey of his life's work, offering a new perspective on the applications — and consequences — of AI powered by computational language.如何以计算方式思考人工智能、宇宙和一切 |史蒂芬·沃尔弗拉姆Drawing on his decades-long mission to formulate the world in computational terms, Stephen Wolfram delivers a profound vision of computation and its role in the future of AI. Amid a debut of mesmerizing visuals depicting the underlying structure of the universe, he provides a sweeping survey of his life's work, offering a new perspective on the applications — and consequences — of AI powered by computational language. https://www.ted.com/talks/stephen_wolfram_how_to_think_computationally_about_ai_the_universe_and_everything?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:119479 119479 Fri, 27 Oct 2023 15:00:58 +0000高等教育不00:17:57泰德
我对结束美国枪支暴力恐怖的追求|露西·麦克巴斯露西·麦克巴斯US Congresswoman Lucy McBath has made it her mission to seek bipartisan solutions for gun safety, leading the way in sponsoring so-called "red flag" laws that prevent gun violence and mass shootings. In a searing and timely talk, she shares the personal story that led her to this work — and a message for why comprehensive, common-sense gun legislation in the US is more urgent than ever.我对结束美国枪支暴力恐怖的追求|露西·麦克巴斯US Congresswoman Lucy McBath has made it her mission to seek bipartisan solutions for gun safety, leading the way in sponsoring so-called "red flag" laws that prevent gun violence and mass shootings. In a searing and timely talk, she shares the personal story that led her to this work — and a message for why comprehensive, common-sense gun legislation in the US is more urgent than ever. https://www.ted.com/talks/lucy_mcbath_my_quest_to_end_the_horror_of_gun_violence_in_the_us?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:119527 119527 Fri, 27 Oct 2023 13:57:04 +0000高等教育不00:12:18泰德
激励团队的简单方法 |大卫·布尔库斯大卫·布尔库斯Using paychecks, perks and carefully worded mission statements plastered on posters, companies are on a never-ending quest to find what drives morale at work. An underappreciated solution lies in the answer to one simple question, says management researcher David Burkus. With notable examples backed by decades of success, he presents a clear path to inspiring your team — and finding your purpose at work.激励团队的简单方法 |大卫·布尔库斯Using paychecks, perks and carefully worded mission statements plastered on posters, companies are on a never-ending quest to find what drives morale at work. An underappreciated solution lies in the answer to one simple question, says management researcher David Burkus. With notable examples backed by decades of success, he presents a clear path to inspiring your team — and finding your purpose at work. https://www.ted.com/talks/david_burkus_a_simple_way_to_inspire_your_team?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:118167 118167 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 14:58:17 +0000高等教育不00:10:43泰德
喜剧如何帮助我们应对残酷的事实|小罗伊·伍德小罗伊·伍德There's a saying that comedy is tragedy plus time. Perhaps that's why some of our biggest problems feel easiest to manage with a dose of humor. Comedian, journalist and actor Roy Wood Jr. has spent his career finding the silly in the serious and using this tactic to influence real change. Listen in to learn how you can tap into the powers of humor in your own life. (This conversation, hosted by comedian Chris Duffy, was part of an exclusive TED Membership event. TED Membership is the best way to support and engage with the big ideas you love from TED. To learn more, visit ted.com/membership.)喜剧如何帮助我们应对残酷的事实|小罗伊·伍德There's a saying that comedy is tragedy plus time. Perhaps that's why some of our biggest problems feel easiest to manage with a dose of humor. 如何让学习像社交媒体一样让人上瘾|路易斯·冯·安路易斯·冯·安When technologist Luis von Ahn was building the popular language-learning platform Duolingo, he faced a big problem: Could an app designed to teach you something ever compete with addictive platforms like Instagram and TikTok? He explains how Duolingo harnesses the psychological techniques of social media and mobile games to get you excited to learn — all while spreading access to education across the world.如何让学习像社交媒体一样让人上瘾|路易斯·冯·安When technologist Luis von Ahn was building the popular language-learning platform Duolingo, he faced a big problem: Could an app designed to teach you something ever compete with addictive platforms like Instagram and TikTok? He explains how Duolingo harnesses the psychological techniques of social media and mobile games to get you excited to learn — all while spreading access to education across the world. https://www.ted.com/talks/luis_von_ahn_how_to_make_learning_as_addictive_as_social_media?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:118164 118164 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 14:53:35 +0000高等教育不00:12:50泰德
护理是真正的工作——让我们这样对待它吧 |沙米·苏里纳拉因沙米·苏里纳拉因Every day, people around the world spend 16 billion hours on unpaid care work — cooking for families, caring for children and older relatives and other routine household tasks — often in addition to other jobs. Employment advocate Sharmi Surianarain says we need to not only acknowledge this labor but also build supportive workplaces that put policies with care work top of mind.护理是真正的工作——让我们这样对待它吧 |沙米·苏里纳拉因Every day, people around the world spend 16 billion hours on unpaid care work — cooking for families, caring for children and older relatives and other routine household tasks — often in addition to other jobs. Employment advocate Sharmi Surianarain says we need to not only acknowledge this labor but also build supportive workplaces that put policies with care work top of mind. https://www.ted.com/talks/shami_surianarain_caregiving_is_real_work_let_s_treat_it_that_way?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:117219 117219 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 15:04:15 +0000高等教育不00:05:10泰德
更清洁的世界可以从稻田开始吉姆·惠特克和杰西卡·惠特克·艾伦吉姆·惠特克和杰西卡·惠特克·艾伦Rice is the world's largest food source — and it's also a massive emitter of methane gas, a key contributor to climate change. Fifth-generation rice farmer Jim Whitaker and his daughter, farmer and conservationist Jessica Whitaker Allen, are working to slash rice's environmental impacts with innovative, sustainable farming practices. They share how they're keeping their family farm in Arkansas profitable while also spreading green farming practices to their neighbors — and, eventually, the rest of the world. "If you take care of the planet, it will take care of you," says Whitaker Allen.更清洁的世界可以从稻田开始吉姆·惠特克和杰西卡·惠特克·艾伦Rice is the world's largest food source — and it's also a massive emitter of methane gas, a key contributor to climate change. Fifth-generation rice farmer Jim Whitaker and his daughter, farmer and conservationist Jessica Whitaker Allen, are working to slash rice's environmental impacts with innovative, sustainable farming practices. They share how they're keeping their family farm in Arkansas profitable while also spreading green farming practices to their neighbors — and, eventually, the rest of the world. "If you take care of the planet, it will take care of you," says Whitaker Allen. https://www.ted.com/talks/jim_whitaker_and_jessica_whitaker_allen_a_cleaner_world_could_start_in_a_rice_field?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:119204 119204 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 14:53:33 +0000高等教育不00:12:17泰德
